itemizedlist.listitem: This example needs BPEL4WS VAD package to be installed on the server, before trying it. To learn more about VAD please visit http://docs.openlinksw.com/virtuoso/VAD.html.
The example script creates services for Credit Rating, United Loan and Star Loan.
The WSDL descriptions for these services are available via CreditRating.vsp, UnitedLoan.vsp and StarLoan.vsp.
On the initial load the BPEL LoanFlow process will be deployed.
The test client can be used to test the BPEL LoanFlow process.

You can test the example using BPEL UI also by going to 'Processes' tab and click "Test" in the listing. This goes to a page allowing you to enter a start message for creating a new instance of this process.
